meanings.definition: Not adjusted or modified for a new purpose or situation.
meanings.sent1: The unadapted book was too difficult for the young readers.
meanings.sent2: The unadapted recipe called for ingredients we didn't have.
meanings.sent3: The unadapted umbrella refused to open in the windy storm.
meanings.sent4: Her unadapted phone felt out of place in the high-tech office.
meanings.sent5: The unadapted puzzle pieces didn't fit together properly.

meanings.definition: Not suitable or prepared for a particular use or environment.
meanings.sent1: The unadapted shoes were uncomfortable for the long hike.
meanings.sent2: The unadapted car struggled on the rough terrain.
meanings.sent3: The unadapted plant wilted in the direct sunlight.
meanings.sent4: His unadapted jokes fell flat at the serious meeting.
meanings.sent5: The unadapted backpack was too small for all the books.
